thread.title: Lynnda Shepherd
thread.title_full: Microfiber Wholesale reviewed by Lynnda Shepherd

author: Lynnda Shepherd
title: Lynnda Shepherd
text: This company has displayed a service minded professionalism that I appreciate. The two items I ordered weren't designed to work together. A staff member contacted me to make sure I was aware of that, I wasn't, thank you Irene Madrid. She made the correction needed and had it on it's way.
